name: Dice and Roll
description:
A turn based RPG made for Miz Jam 1.
All actions can be done with left click. ESC brings up the main menu, the scroll wheel zooms in and out and the keyboard arrows move the camera.

I did not have time to allow independent resolutions with the game, which means the game is locked to 1080p.

Completed in ~40 non-consecutive hours.

Github page : https://github.com/Tourmi/MizJam1
